(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT Each) (NN year))
    (NP (PRP$ our) (NN makan))
    (VP (VBZ kakis)
      (VP (VB organize)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN gathering))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (NNP Good) (NNP Friday))))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB remember)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN death))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNP Jesus)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(year-2, Each-1)
tmod(kakis-5, year-2)
poss(makan-4, our-3)
nsubj(kakis-5, makan-4)
root(ROOT-0, kakis-5)
xcomp(kakis-5, organize-6)
det(gathering-8, a-7)
dobj(organize-6, gathering-8)
prep(gathering-8, on-9)
nn(Friday-11, Good-10)
pobj(on-9, Friday-11)
aux(remember-13, to-12)
xcomp(organize-6, remember-13)
det(death-15, the-14)
dobj(remember-13, death-15)
prep(death-15, of-16)
pobj(of-16, Jesus-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJ Many))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNS kakis))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBP help)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP me))
                  (VP (VB organize)
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ various) (NN makan) (NNS sessions))
                    (PP (IN throughout)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN year)))))))))))
    (VP (VBP happen)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB be)
            (NP
              (NP (NNS Christians))
              (CC and)
              (NP (DT every) (NNP Good) (NNP Friday) (, ,)))))))))


nsubj(happen-16, Many-1)
prep(Many-1, of-2)
det(kakis-4, the-3)
pobj(of-2, kakis-4)
nsubj(help-6, who-5)
rcmod(kakis-4, help-6)
nsubj(organize-8, me-7)
ccomp(help-6, organize-8)
det(sessions-12, the-9)
amod(sessions-12, various-10)
nn(sessions-12, makan-11)
dobj(organize-8, sessions-12)
prep(organize-8, throughout-13)
det(year-15, the-14)
pobj(throughout-13, year-15)
root(ROOT-0, happen-16)
aux(Christians-19, to-17)
cop(Christians-19, be-18)
xcomp(happen-16, Christians-19)
cc(Christians-19, and-20)
det(Friday-23, every-21)
nn(Friday-23, Good-22)
conj(Christians-19, Friday-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VB organize)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ special) (NN gathering))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB share)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN joy))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (PRP$ our) (NN faith)))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ seems)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (NNS Christians))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ only) (NNS people))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WP who))
                (S
                  (VP (VBP are)
                    (ADJP (RB so) (JJ morbid)
                      (SBAR (IN as)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB keep)
                              (NP
                                (NP (JJ commemorating) (NN someone) (POS 's))
                                (NN deathday)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(seems-2, It-1)
root(ROOT-0, seems-2)
mark(people-8, that-3)
nsubj(people-8, Christians-4)
cop(people-8, are-5)
det(people-8, the-6)
amod(people-8, only-7)
ccomp(seems-2, people-8)
nsubj(morbid-12, who-9)
cop(morbid-12, are-10)
advmod(morbid-12, so-11)
rcmod(people-8, morbid-12)
mark(keep-15, as-13)
aux(keep-15, to-14)
dep(morbid-12, keep-15)
amod(someone-17, commemorating-16)
poss(deathday-19, someone-17)
possessive(someone-17, 's-18)
dobj(keep-15, deathday-19)

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (SBAR (IN if)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (VP
            (ADVP (RB ever))
            (VBD wondered)
            (PP (IN about)
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB why))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP we))
                  (VP (VBP celebrate)))))
            (NP (JJ Good) (NNP Friday))))
        (, ,)))))

aux(wondered-6, have-4)
advmod(wondered-6, ever-5)

prep(wondered-6, about-7)
advmod(celebrate-10, why-8)
nsubj(celebrate-10, we-9)
pcomp(about-7, celebrate-10)
amod(Friday-12, Good-11)
tmod(wondered-6, Friday-12)

  (S
    (NP (RB then))
    (VP (MD can)
      (ADVP
        (NP (CD I))
        (RB personally))
      (VP (VB invite)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB join)
              (NP (PRP us))
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (DT this) (JJ special) (NN makan) (NN session))))))))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP It))
      (VP (VBZ 's)
        (NP
          (NP (DT an) (JJ informal) (NN gathering))
          (PP (IN at)
            (NP (NNP Chinese) (NNP Swimming) (NNP Club))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (S
        (NP (PRP we))
        (VP (MD 'll)
          (VP (VB be)
            (VP (VBG catering)
              (NP (DT some) (NN food))))))
      (CC and)
      (S
        (NP (PRP I))
        (VP (MD will)
          (VP (VB be)
            (VP (VBG sharing)
              (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS thoughts))
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN significance))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NNP Good) (NNP Friday))))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(gathering-5, 's-2)
det(gathering-5, an-3)

root(ROOT-0, gathering-5)
prep(gathering-5, at-6)
nn(Club-9, Chinese-7)
nn(Club-9, Swimming-8)
pobj(at-6, Club-9)
cc(gathering-5, and-10)
nsubj(catering-14, we-11)
aux(catering-14, 'll-12)
aux(catering-14, be-13)
conj(gathering-5, catering-14)
det(food-16, some-15)
dobj(catering-14, food-16)
cc(catering-14, and-17)
nsubj(sharing-21, I-18)
aux(sharing-21, will-19)
aux(sharing-21, be-20)
conj(catering-14, sharing-21)
poss(thoughts-23, my-22)
dobj(sharing-21, thoughts-23)
prep(sharing-21, on-24)

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB yshirley7@gmail.com)
      (CC or)
      (VB call)
      (NP (PRP her))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (CD 97946034))))))
